name: @bitscorp-mcp/mcp-adjust
description: Access your Adjust data seamlessly from any MCP client. Query reports, metrics, and performance data on-demand to gain insights into your campaigns. Perfect for quick lookups like install numbers for specific campaigns.

date.description: Date for the report in YYYY-MM-DD format

sort.description: Comma-separated list of metrics/dimensions to sort by (use - for descending)

metrics.description: Comma-separated list of metrics to include

currency.description: Currency used for conversion of money related metrics

dimensions.description: Comma-separated values to group by (e.g., day,country,network). Options include: hour, day, week, month, year, quarter, os_name, device_type, app, app_token, store_id, store_type, currency, currency_code, network, campaign, campaign_network, campaign_id_network, adgroup, adgroup_network, adgroup_id_network, creative, country, country_code, region, partner_name, partner_id, channel, platform

format_dates.description: If false, date dimensions are returned in ISO format

ad_spend_mode.description: Determines the ad spend source applied in calculations

cohort_maturity.description: Display values for immature or only mature cohorts

attribution_type.description: Type of engagement the attribution awards

attribution_source.description: Whether in-app activity is assigned to install source or divided

tools.name: adjust-standard-report
tools.description: Get a standard Adjust report with common metrics

app_tokens.description: Comma-separated list of app tokens to include

report_type.description: Type of standard report to generate
